packcore.midnightconfig.title: PackCore Configuration
packcore.midnightconfig.prompt_default_c: Show Config Selection Dialog On Start Up
packcore.midnightconfig.promptSetDefault:
Enable or disable the configuration selection dialog
that appears during game startup when multiple
config files are detected. 

âš  Requires game restart to take effect.
packcore.midnightconfig.dialogTimeoutMin:
How long the config selection dialog will wait
before timing out (1-60 minutes).
packcore.midnightconfig.enableCustomMenu:
Replace the vanilla main menu with PackCore's
custom main menu design.

âš  Requires game restart to take effect.
packcore.midnightconfig.enableCustomPano:
Use PackCore's custom panorama background
instead of the default Minecraft panorama.

âš  Requires game restart to take effect.
